title: I-notebook
para: I notebook helps you to organize notes online with all create rewrite undo and delete options user can search required notes and also tag important note to catagorize them
about: take and maintain your daily notes online for free
Discription: I-notebook is full stack web application
Developed using Reactjs and Nodejs On mongodb Nosql database technology
User can Create account to the service with email id and use the application any time
User's account is secured with JSON webtoken authentication
User can also delete modify and rename the previously stored notes
Searching functionality keeps the notes very hendful to find
Learnings: Learned first time react js and json webtoken and user authentication
Password increption of user and verification of it
